review: Love that I don't have to stream from my computer!

review: I have Amazon services on my Blu-Ray player, but this is SO much faster, and works better than that.  I bought this side by side with a google TV player, and there is no comparison.  Amazon Fire Stick is so much better, I'm thinking of giving the Google stick to someone.
author: J. Wood "jaw1964"

review: Great Product! Awesome Customer Service! Fast Shipping!
author: Brian
